message.content:
cs.CV, cs.HC, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.RO 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CV (Computer Vision) is the most likely category as the paper proposes a marker-free AR solution for C-arm repositioning, which involves computer vision techniques such as 3D pose estimation and tracking. 
- cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is also likely as the proposed system involves a head-mounted display for the X-ray technician and aims to improve communication and guidance in surgery rooms. 
- cs.GR (Graphics) is relevant as the paper discusses the visualization of virtual objects in an AR environment. 
- cs.MM (Multimedia) is relevant as the paper involves the recording and playback of 3D poses via an integrated infrared sensor. 
- cs.RO (Robotics) is less likely but still possible as the paper discusses the use of wearable computing and sensing technologies in the context of surgical interventions.
